alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 7:58PM CST until February 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Monroe, Clarke and Wilcox Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 42.0 feet, Water begins to inundate the Eureka Landing community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Sunday the stage was 39.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 42.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
